title: Can't receive call on my Google Pixel.
content:
I can't recieve call or call someone on my google pixel. When I call on.my pixel from my othet device I hear it's ringing but when I try to recieve call by sliding up the receiving button, I can't. It went to the notification center & also ftom their can't receive calls.
Fot that issue (I think) my microphone and earphone jack isn't working.
I tried flashing my device but it won't work.
